attributes.title: Niranjani Akhada Pancha, Governing Leaders of Hinduism's Largest Apex Body, at Nithyananda Peetham
attributes.description:
During today’s morning Satsang, several important leaders of Sanatana Hindu Dharma visited with Paramahamsa Nithyananda, including Mahant Narendra Giri Ji.  Mahant Narendra Giri Ji is not only a member of the panch of Niranjani akhada but also the President of 
Akhila Bharatiya Akhada Parishad. Akhada Parishad is the governing body of all the 13 akhadas in the Hindu Sannyas sampradaya. It 
organizes the Kumbh Mela, which is the world’s largest gathering of humanity on the planet.

The other guests, also panch members of the Niranjani akhada, included Srimahant Dharamraj Bharati ji, head of Gujarat region, and Sachiv Shri Ashis Giri ji who is the Mahant of Varanasi and Allahabad. 
(October 16, 2016)
